name: QEMU Windows VM (Small Machine)
postCreateCommand: /bin/bash -c 'apt-get update && apt-get install -y qemu-system-x86 bridge-utils curl unzip && curl -L -o windows.qcow2 https://app.vagrantup.com/win11/boxes/eval/versions/22000.556.220305-1504/providers/qemu.box && tar -xvf windows.qcow2 && mv box.img win11.qcow2 && nohup qemu-system-x86_64 -hda win11.qcow2 -m 2G -smp 2 -vga std -net nic,model=e1000 -net user -vnc :0 -usb -device usb-tablet & curl -L -o novnc.zip https://github.com/novnc/noVNC/archive/v1.4.0.zip && unzip novnc.zip && ./noVNC-1.4.0/utils/launch.sh --listen 6080 --vnc localhost:5900'
